entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 03:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 4.6°C
Wind: ENE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 7:41 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 7:41 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 7:41 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
